displayName.text: Kristin Liu-Carway at Douglas Elliman Real Estate

formattedAddress: 140 Franklin St, New York, NY 10013, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Kristin Liu-Carway at Douglas Elliman Real Estate
Kristin Liu-Carway at Douglas Elliman Real Estate

adrFormatAddress: 140 Franklin St, New York, NY 10013-2976, USA

originalText.text: Kristin is an incredibly professional and knowledgeable real estate professional. She helped me land an amazing apartment during peak season that I would never have found on my own. She carefully reviewed my application, making sure to patiently navigate the renters market. She gave me tips on how to settle into the city, making sure that I felt taken care of every step of the way! I cannot recommend Kristin enough!

text.text: Kristin is an incredibly professional and knowledgeable real estate professional. She helped me land an amazing apartment during peak season that I would never have found on my own. She carefully reviewed my application, making sure to patiently navigate the renters market. She gave me tips on how to settle into the city, making sure that I felt taken care of every step of the way! I cannot recommend Kristin enough!

originalText.text:
Kristin is the standard of professionalism, whose transparency eases any anxiety I’ve had about New York’s messy market.

I signed my first lease with her help two years ago at the height of housing demand in August. Having always been a crippling procrastinator, it was a huge relief when Kristin found a neigh perfect location fitting both my cousin and me within a week and a half.

Kristin continues to work with my family’s housing needs in New York today, always a call away.

text.text:
Kristin is the standard of professionalism, whose transparency eases any anxiety I’ve had about New York’s messy market.

I signed my first lease with her help two years ago at the height of housing demand in August. Having always been a crippling procrastinator, it was a huge relief when Kristin found a neigh perfect location fitting both my cousin and me within a week and a half.

Kristin continues to work with my family’s housing needs in New York today, always a call away.

originalText.text: Kristin is a very knowledgeable, tenacious and savvy real-estate broker. When we began looking for a condo in Brooklyn, she met with us to get to know our needs, wants, must-haves and deal-breakers. She asked all the right questions, including many we had not thought of ourselves. She gained a thorough understanding of what we were seeking both in terms of the actual property and the process of getting there. As we moved forward, she helped us select neighborhoods and units that were within our range and checked off most of our “boxes”. Her instincts and advice were right on target and we felt a complete trust as she navigated us through a challenging market. She was patient as we were learning exactly what we were looking for and our thoughts evolved with each viewing. Kristin was very effective and accommodating scheduling visits and working with seller’s reps. When it came time to make an offer and negotiate — Kristin really shined, getting us a stronger deal than we’d first expected. She did not stop there — she facilitated communication between seller, attorneys, title, and building managment — and when we did our final walk-through, she was prepared and helpfu: both practically (checked every outlet and fixture!) and emotionally…she gave us a sense of calm, confidence. She went above and beyond at every step and we are happy and settled with extreme gratitude for all her efforts. We cannot recommend her services strongly enough; Kristin will advocate and cater to her clients and make you feel like you are the most important job she has. Excellent experience!

originalText.text: Kristin was knowledgeable, friendly and very helpful. I would recommend her to others and would definitely work with her again!
